original_data.Title: Post Graduate Program in AI and Machine Learning
original_data.Short Intro: Beat the curve with our Post Graduate Program in AI and ML, co-sponsored by Purdue University & IBM. Designed after Simplilearn's intense Bootcamp learning model, AI ML Course will help you achieve the most remarkable results & elevate your expertise.
original_data.Course Type: Ranked #1 AI and ML Course by Career Karma

original_data.Title: AI & Machine Learning Bootcamp
original_data.Short Intro: This AI and Machine Learning Bootcamp in collaboration with Caltech, will help you advance your career as an AI and ML specialist. The AI and ML Bootcamp includes live classes delivered by industry experts, hands-on labs, Industry-relevant projects, and masterclasses by Caltech professors.
original_data.Course Type: Caltech is Ranked #1 in Best Universities in the US by Times Higher Education

original_data.Title: Professional Certificate Course in AI and Machine Learning
